data.text: Wone yalingukanyigwa chila mhela, ila kangulutilila kuwa na nhumbula igagadale,
Wone watanganiche walongoze, wanhu wangusangalalaga,
Yalingugana luhala kangumdita mhaza wa heye yasangalale,
Wone mndewa yatumiye hachi, kanguipaga isi kwima nzinzili,
Yalingumhembuliza munhu yowalingikalasa habehi kwa udesi,
Mwihe kangugwilizwaga kwa gehile ga heye,
Yatanganiche kanguzizela hachi za mzunwa,
Yalingubeza kangwambuzaga kilewa kuli muji weng'ha,
Wone yawele na luhala yetwanze na mpoka,
Walingugana kubohola danda, wangumzudilaga yalihela nongwa,
Mpoka kangulajilaga ng'halazi ya heye ne uviso,
Wone mndewa yahulichize mbuli za udesi,
Mzunwa na yalingubunza wangiwhana kwa chinhu chimwe,
Mndewa yalinguwamulila wazunwa kwa hachi,
Kuzapigwa na kukanyigwa, vyangigalaga luhala,
Wone wehile walongoze, gehile gangonjezekaga,
Umkanye mwanago, naye hokudita uwe na lunhwinhwi,
Wone hawe haduhu ulotezi wa chiuloli, wanhu wanguwaga walihela kuhulichiza,
Mpogozi hambe yakanyigwe kwa ulonzi hela,
Kwangumona munhu yalingulonga ne kijesa?
Yalingumhembuliza ng'hatu mpogozi wa heye kulawa uwana,
Yazudile kangwambuzaga kilewa,
Kidaya kwa munhu kwangumdulisaga yuye,
Yalinguwa hamwe na mhizi kangiwifya yuye,
Kuwadumba wanhu ndo kiwichila idiwa gwegwe,
Wenji wanguganaga kiwika habehi na mndewa,
Yalihela hachi ndo izudizo kwa yagoloche,
